originalText.text: Hands down top 3 dining experiences I’ve ever had in Manhattan. The ambiance was flawless, acoustics on point, and the service was amazing. Alice was great, she made it a memorable experience, and I would highly recommend this restaurant to everyone!

text.text: Hands down top 3 dining experiences I’ve ever had in Manhattan. The ambiance was flawless, acoustics on point, and the service was amazing. Alice was great, she made it a memorable experience, and I would highly recommend this restaurant to everyone!

originalText.text: Cozy enough spot for a date night but casual enough for any week night dinner. We started outside but were at a table without heating that got a bit chilly as the evening set in, so we moved inside for the rest of our dinner. They are enforcing Covid-19 safety measures and we felt pretty comfortable inside. The servers were responsive and attentive. Food, as is pictured, was excellent. The lobster Mac n cheese was a bit bland but came with a healthy serving of lobster. Highly recommend the truffle fries (you might want to guard them against your greedy dining mates) and give the NY/Manhattan sour a try.

originalText.text: This restaurant is soooooo racist. they were talking about a couple. a white man with his black woman. Then the waitress switch from white to spanish. Unbelieveable i will never eat at this restaurant or any restaurant like this ever again that does not have black and white emplyees and they must be able to serve both communities. This is truly disgusting barbaric behavior. Horrible service means my food was horrible as well.

originalText.text:
Wow. I came here after work for a quick simple meal, and I was blown away. I had no expectations so maybe that helped because a lot of neighboring restaurants are mediocre but this place is special. The service was efficient despite being almost at 35% capacity with indoor dining and outdoor dining with only a handful of staff. Ricky the bartender made me a fabulous gin martini, that was delicious and my server was great with suggestion in terms of portions and dietary restrictions. THE RISOTTO IS BEYOND MY IMAGINATION! Holy Moly! When I tell you that I thought it was just a bunch of mush, boy was I wrong. Every bite was absolutely delicious that I wanted to cry! Not even trying to be dramatic.
The ambience and crowd was romantic but humble enough to go out with some friends and enjoy a good meal and a drink. I’m bringing everyone I know who appreciates food and a good atmosphere to this place.

originalText.text:
We had a great time at the Lovelance.

I ordered their only vegetarian entree option on the menu, the risotto. It was delicious and worth the price. I recommend trying it out.

They have a variety of Gins that you can try from and interesting cocktail variations,. I'm sure you'll find a drink to enjoy.

The service was all the time nice and fast.
